text.author: Jeremy Garcia, Jono Bacon, Stuart Langridge
text.title: Bad Voltage 3Ã—58: Large Langridge Model
text.summary: On an episode of Bad Voltage, three people discuss concerns about AI and Large Language Models, focusing on the 'free software complaint', which objects to companies like OpenAI using Internet data to which they do not hold the copyright and then charging users for access to models trained on it, as well as talking about proposed EU regulations on declaring LLM data sources.
